TopicTitle: just made a profile to say I just docked...

Articles.Content: It feels amazing! All I could do until now is just get close, but I literally just now docked two station cores together. I'm ready to build death stars now!

Hi and welcome to the forums!

Congratulations on docking!

Congratulations! That is the most thrilling of first milestones - I remember when I decided to finally learn to do it manually on my own. It was tough at first, but now it's not daunting or hard (still enjoyable, though).

Today I docked 4 modules to my orbital space station, using direct-from-surface rendezvous (no parking orbit). If you told me a year ago that I'd be doing that in KSP without an autopilot, I'd have said "What the Hell is Kerbal Space Program?"

Welcome to the forum, we look forward to your mission reports and mad creations!
Hello congrats on such a major acheivment!
